name: FOLD (Carlo Albino)
description:
1 - 4 player local multiplayer action!

Goal

Collect as many orbs as you can before the time runs out.  
You lose orbs if you are crushed by the fold.

Controls

Controller: 
Left stick to move; Right stick to aim; Right bumper to shoot
Keyboard (single-player): 
WASD to move; Arrow keys to aim; Spacebar to shoot

Press escape to return to the main menu from the game
